title: Understanding PHI
text: Protected Health Information (PHI) refers to any information in a medical record that can be used to identify an individual and that was created, used, or disclosed in the course of providing a health-care service.

title: Examples of PHI
text: Examples of PHI include names, addresses, birth dates, Social Security numbers, and medical records.

hintAnswer: information included in a medical record that can be used to identify an individual and that was used, created, or disclosed in the process of providing a $$health-care$$ service
title: Identifying PHI
text: Which of the following is considered PHI?
choices: information included in a medical record that can be used to identify an individual and that was used, created, or disclosed in the process of providing a $$health-care$$ service
information related to the nurse and their care procedures
